transcript.text: Youtube goes wrong :(
*Music*
"This video was not planned but after seeing what was happening
I told myself it was not a bad idea to keep you abreast "
"You are right, YouTube wants to fuck us, really bad"
"And indeed Youtube decided to fuck us
to fuck us
Youtube recently changed it's algorithm but some bugs have appeared
YouTube automatically unsubscribe people from some YouTube channels
The view counter is shitty
And finally, worst of all, people do not receive their subscriptions
Videos of people which he subscribed
It led to a drop of views
A drop of number of subscribers
And a drop of motivation of all content creators
But the REAL subject of this video is the algorithm and all that that implies
The YouTube algorithm what is it?
It's a system that works independently
And fully automatic and that highlights videos based on certain criteria
The "WatchTime" is what percentage of the video the guy who clicked watched
The number of likes and the number of comments
It worked like this for years but youtube never gave on what criteria was based its algorithm
otherwise it wouldn't make sense since everyone had abused
But wait ! There's not already a plenty of people who totally abused anyway?
* If you want us to continue this pro videos, don't forget to drop a blue thumb at the beginning of the video bro *
* Hello, the Ministry of Culture inform you if you liked this video *
* You can click on the blue thumb and subscribe to the channel *
* If you want that I try in a video, then we will say bah 10,000 like on this video *
*Turn off the light. Turn the sound at the maximum. And drop a big like on my video *
* If you kiffes then drop a blue thumb dude *
* Just before the video starts I invite you to drop a like *
* drop a blue thumb *
*Click on like*
* You click the little blue thumb *
In short, Youtube algorithm has changed and now the videos are highlighted
in suggestions on the home page or in the "Trends" tab, are not at all the same as before
So people who falsified their stats and who abused the algorithm
which were push foward
WELL THEN ! DID YOU SEE YOUR VIEWS NUMBER DROPPING ?
FUCK !
I can understand that we can blame on Youtube for bugs that I quoted at the beginning of the video
this is nonsense and it penalizes small and medium youtubers
and it is those that need to be less penalized today
A big Youtubeur do more than one third of the views he did before
it does not matter, he will even win money, he can still live
and he will continue his videos, and it will always make views
But a Youtubeur which is already a bit ric-rac, and even motivation level he expects his channel to gets bigger and advance
and we throw a spanner in his works like that, THAT is disgusting!
My question is this :
"Can we really blame Youtube to have changed its algorithm?"
NO !
EH NON guys!
In Youtube they are not fools, they saw that everyone could understand the algorithm and manipulate it
like IbraTVe, and his .... "Poce Bleu", which became his trademark
* I am, the emperor of "poces bleu" *
*Poce bleus*
*Poce bleus*
*Poce bleus*
* drop 200,000 Poce bleus *
* If I have 300,000 poce bleus*
drop 100,000 poce bleus
POCES BLEUS
It is normal to give an objectif of blue thumbs at each fucking videos?
It's something you do when you make a big project or when you make no so much videos

Antoine Daniel could do it
* Laughs *
When it is an event, when it's something that changes, that is, that ...
on which you worked hard, then OK!
But ask fucking likes in the beginning of the videos
is like judging an apple before having eaten
PewDiePie this is for you
you have at least to bite the apple
So for a video you must at least watch a part of the video
It's fine to want to support the creators that we like, but the blue thumbs system
is there to say if you liked or not the video
If you just listen to what say youtubers and you're not doing your own opinion about the video
It sucks.
So we do not know too much about what the new algorithm is based but everyone noticed
MORE a video make a blue thumbs record  in a little time
MORE it will be pushed forward, and it will end up in the Trends
But I keep seeing people cry on social networks:
"Youtube dies, it's the end of Youtube, blah"
And they are a lot of people who say it for good reasons, which are good
but others who speak just about THAT algorithm and freaks out because they see their number of views down
but honestly, today we focus more on
"Is that my video has a good title, a good thumbnail"
AND ESPECIALLY "is it have a lot of likes, is that people will put a lot of feedback"
"I have to find a way that they do so, so I make VIEWS"
It's been how many years that a someone has not asked himself
"Is that my video is good?"
Is it true or not ?
It's been how many years that a someone has not asked himself ?
This is the base anyway! This is making videos that are good!
Find the best way to make cool videos, which please
and that please us, the creators
Today, many people grumble because they see crappy stuff highlighted
not funny videos, not cool, SHITTY
But my friends, those who put their blue thumbs at the start of the video
even before they looked it, they contribute to it
Those who listen to their idol that tells them "Like the video"
You contribute to this shit!
I am fucking letting myself go like David Lafarge and Sifano, it's not good
* Oh yeah, the truth is here dude *
THANK YOU FOR LEADING ME THE EXAMPLE TO NOT FOLLOW GUYS! THANK YOU !!
So the smallest youtubers which don't have a millions of subscribers but are still making views
because don't forget that 50,000, 100,000 views is HUGE fuck !
We forgot it because we think just at the million views, even me sometimes a video  makes just 1 million views
and I make "Oh, it's a flop"

** Slap noise **
But shut up kid!
Should stop cry too, fuck
In short I have no moral or lesson for the end of this video
Ah! IbraTV has released a new video, wait
* So the goal is to make 1 million subscribers, in 24h
* If ... uh ... you do that. I'll remove my channel, I'll make a final video in which ...
**Slap hands**
This is the first time in my life that I see a youtuber making fun of you more than the political dude
And what's funny is that this guy is the guy is the LESS penalized by the politics of youtube
it is one that has benefited the most from the algorithm change
And the one who wants to take the most drastic measures to show to Youtube that he's not happy? !!
Well tell me that nobody believed and fed these bullshit
* Cry in his microphone *
In short, I don't blame you IbraTV ... You got your reasons ... which reason ignore
Honnestly a moment we must stop this bullshits
Come on, we all just make videos, we try to make good videos for people who are on the platform, ok
we stop yelling
they saw we yelled, just PewDiePie, PewDiePie, number 1 in the world
made a rant about it ... They saw!
In short I understand that youtubers are not happy but you have to not make anything
and crawl ashore to be put forward by the YouTube algorithm
In fact now the algorithm has changed and everyone is looking to how and on what they are based to put us forward
Well folks, the answer is stupid ...
Make good videos
Goodbye
